physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Demonstrated complete atrioventricular block after cross-clamp removal, requiring temporary atrioventricular pacing. Regained conducted sinus rhythm prior to leaving the operating room.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hypoxemia worsened post-operatively, reaching 37% at its lowest value.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Onset of dyspnea and dry cough.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Intermittent complete atrioventricular block began on POD 5 requiring pacing.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Underwent implantation of a permanent epicardial dual chamber pacemaker.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hypoxemia continued to worsen; arterial blood gas tests showed decreased blood pH.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Abdominal discomfort and respiratory distress onset.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: New chest radiograph evidenced multiple pulmonary consolidations.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Chest radiograph evidenced reduction of pulmonary consolidations.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Dry cough persisted but showed improvement in respiratory parameters.
